name: mylife at Magna
description: STAY CONNECTED - Download the Magna mylife app and stay up-to-date on company, group, and division news and insights. mylife@Magna  experience a new kind of company app.  Experience the mylife app:  Company information, news, and announcements: Be the first to know whats going on at Magna.  Up-to-date event calendar: Get an overview of events and important dates. Add items to your personal calendar.  Division updates: Stay informed on your division, new colleagues, local happenings etc.  Employee Magazines: Read the latest articles from Magna People as well as other division newsletters.  Job Postings: Check out the latest postings in your division and around the globe.  Videos: Watch the latest company videos.  Personalized Notifications: Customize content alerts and frequency of notifications.  The mylife app is available to all Magna divisions and sites and can be installed on private and business phones alike  making Magna more accessible than it has ever been before. Magna technology travels millions of miles
